note.title: [Alert] 监控ZBOX数据加载
note.body:
#### Zbox 数据加载缺失， 请查询下面SQL。 SELECT DISTINCT C.[DateKey],'[dm].[Fct_Qulouxia_Store_List]' AS TableName
FROM [Foodunion].[dm].[Fct_Qulouxia_Store_List] A RIGHT JOIN [dm].[Dim_Calendar] C
ON A.DateKey=C.Datekey
WHERE C.[DateKey]>=CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),DATEADD(DAY,-7,GETDATE()),112)
AND C.[DateKey]<CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE() ,112)
AND A.DateKey IS NULL
union
SELECT DISTINCT C.[DateKey],'[dm].[Fct_Qulouxia_Sales]' AS TableName
FROM [Foodunion].[dm].[Fct_Qulouxia_Sales] A RIGHT JOIN [dm].[Dim_Calendar] C
ON A.DateKey=C.Datekey
WHERE C.[DateKey]>=CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),DATEADD(DAY,-7,GETDATE()),112)
AND C.[DateKey]<CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE() ,112)
AND A.DateKey IS NULL
union
SELECT DISTINCT C.[DateKey],'[dm].[Fct_Qulouxia_StoreInventory]' AS TableName
FROM [Foodunion].[dm].[Fct_Qulouxia_StoreInventory] A RIGHT JOIN [dm].[Dim_Calendar] C
ON A.DateKey=C.Datekey
WHERE C.[DateKey]>=CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),DATEADD(DAY,-7,GETDATE()),112)
AND C.[DateKey]<CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE() ,112)
AND A.DateKey IS NULL;
